Name: Inch Arran
Namesake: Inch Arran Point, Dalhousie, New Brunswick
Builder: Davie Shipbuilding and Repairing Co. Ltd., Lauzon, Quebec
Identification:
pennant number: K667
pennant number: FFE 308
Badge: On a field barry wavy of eighteen pieces argent and azure, a roundel or displaying a saltire gules charged in the center with a lymphad with four oars sable, sail argent, flags or[1]
Range: 7,200 nautical miles (13,334 km) at 11 knots (20.4 km/h)
Armament:
2 × QF 4 in (102 mm) /40 Mk.XIX guns
10 × 20 mm anti-aircraft guns (2×2, 6×1)
1 × Hedgehog
2 × Depth charge racks[2]
